snippet: The automaker’s sales volume gained 19 percent and retail sales to individual consumers rose 17 percent compared with a year ago.
abstract: General Motors says its sales for September increased 19 percent compared with year ago; GM matches continued strong performance by Chrysler Group; over all, American auto industry sales rose 9 percent in September.
lead_paragraph: The automaker’s sales volume gained 19 percent and retail sales to individual consumers rose 17 percent compared with a year ago.

headline.main: G.M. Sales Rebound in September to Increase 19%
headline.print_headline: G.M. Sales Rebound in September to Increase 19%
